property.description: Used to render a resizable popup.

Used to render a modal popup. Note: this will only cover the body of a document. Make sure the document body takes up 100% of the window. For example: <html><body><div style="height=100%;witdh:100%;"><div></body></html>
When set to 'true' this panel is draggable. The user will be able to drag the panel to any position on the page. Note: all Draggable panels must be contained in a form.
